Text: You wouldn't happen to have the season 1 PAL DVD with english subtitles?  Been looking for it...
Is it possible to find subtitles for this somewhere?
pingpong34: I have the dvds with english subtitles, but I have no idea how to turn them into .avi files so I can upload them...
hey does anyone know where i can get english subtitles? thanks

Here you can find the english subtitle only for the first episode:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6333301/Srugim-_english_subtitle_-Season2_Episode1_
gibresh, i bought the dvds of srugim 2 and it has english subtitles. I dont know how to copy them from the discs and upload them. If you know how i'd be happy to do it for you.

aj62459 
There is no easy way to extract the subtitles from a dvd. you will need patience and will.
to do this you will need the program "subrip" that allows you to do it.
 download from:
http://www.videohelp.com/tools/Subrip 
you can use this guides:
http://www.doom9.org/index.html?/subrip.htm
http://www.afterdawn.com/guides/archive/rip_subtitles_with_subrip.cfm
it's not to much complicated but takes time.
and if you passed all of this then let me know...
good luck
